Label.label: Brand your player with your own watermark. Enter a link to a file available on the web.
Timer that shows the current position in the video in minutes and seconds.
Switch to full screen mode, and back to regular mode.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Play button on the video layer. Usually shown when the video is loading or paused.
Play or Pause according to the state of the video
Mute/unmute button with a vertical volume control bar
Drag handle to navigate video, and see the buffering and playing progress
Replays current video from the start.
Run current video at double speed. Sound will be muted

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Run current video four times faster. Sound will be muted

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Run current video eight times faster. Sound will be muted

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: A button on the video to turn the sound on. Used for less intrusive auto play - starting the video muted and allowing the user to easily bring back the sound.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Share this movie. Supports email sending, posting to social networks, social bookmarking and grabbing of the embed code.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Allows downloading the video to a local computer. By default does not support mix downloads (please contact professional services if you require mix downloads)

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Launches the Uploader (Contribution Wizard). Allows users to add videos, images and audio files to the video. Enable this button only if you wish to allow uploading.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Add additional videos, images or audio files to this video

Label.label: Launches the Video Editor. Enable this button only if you wish to allow remixing.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Allows users to change the thumbnail of the video. Usually used only by content administrators for CMS systems.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Use current frame as the video thumbnail

Label.label: Allows users to report content as inappropriate. You may then moderate the content on the Moderation tab in the Kaltura Management Console.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Opens a window with a list of the users who contributed media to this mix.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Users who contributed to this mix

Label.label: Shows subtitles for this video. If there are no subtitles configured the component will be hidden. If you are interested in adding subtitles to your videos, contact Kaltura professional services.
Show subtitles on screen if available

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen
